name: Music_1949.wav
keywords: ['suspenseful music', 'shaker', 'synth sounds', 'eerie music', 'no percussion', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'synth swells']
caption: This suspenseful song features synth sounds. At the beginning, a synth plays a constant sound in the background. Another synth plays a swell with a vibrato effect. After it pauses, a shaker is played. The mood of this song is eerie and suspenseful. This song can be played in a horror movie.
